about_the_game:
Patchworld is an ARPG where you can create your own spells. Find magic shards and make spells out of them that will help in the battle against a variety of enemies.

Ten years ago, an unidentified cataclysm occurred, the first patch from another world appeared on the body of the planet, and magic shards appeared afterwards.
The intelligent inhabitants of Karamarin very quickly learned how to use magic and create spells, and their lives changed beyond recognition.
Some researchers wondered about the nature of this force, and soon they found out that the cataclysm is still going on, and new patches are appearing in different places.
Is there a hero who can save this world?

  • Flexible spell craft system based on loot in the form of magic shards with an almost infinite number of final options.
  • A variety of monsters with special types of resistance, necessitating the creation of an arsenal of different spells.
  • Patches from different worlds based on the culture and aesthetics of different regions of the world.
  • A story campaign that is available for both single-player and online co-op.
  • Different character classes with a specific crafting system.

short_description: As in other Action RPGs, you have to save the world. But this time there is no need to look for a legendary spell or an artifact created by a great sorcerer of antiquity. You create the spells yourself, and it's up to you to decide what they will be.
